data.message: And to the guy who hated on tupac your fuckin dumb tupac a music is way more meaningful than eminems eminem meaningful songs is him complaining about his life that wasn't that bad at all I know people who had it ten times worse and they don't hate their mom eminem is one of the best of all time but he ain't had a dope album since eminem show I feel white people love to dick ride him cause he's white I have all his albums and I know rap I rap myself most of ems fan can't rap so your opinion on rap don't matter and tupac is way better than em and PAC didn't sell his soul em is Demonic
